protein.specific_function: Hydrolase that deubiquitinates monoubiquitinated target proteins such as histone H2A and H2B. Required for proper progression through S phase and subsequent mitotic entry. May regulate the DNA damage response (DDR) checkpoint through deubiquitination of H2A at DNA damage sites. Associates with the chromatin

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds

reference.reference_text: Sloper-Mould KE, Eyre HJ, Wang XW, Sutherland GR, Baker RT: Characterization and chromosomal localization of USP3, a novel human ubiquitin-specific protease. J Biol Chem. 1999 Sep 17;274(38):26878-84.
